entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
